rule: Each description must not portray the background or outline the setting of the subjects.
coverage: A dedicated athlete with toned muscles wearing vibrant running gear, captured mid-stride on a sunlit outdoor track. Sweat glistens on his focused face as he pushes forward with determination. The late afternoon golden sunlight casts long, dynamic shadows, highlighting his powerful movement. In the background, a lush green stadium with blurred cheering spectators creates a lively yet unobtrusive setting. The image evokes a sense of perseverance, energy, and the exhilarating pursuit of victory.
validityText:
The input is a concise, English-language sentence that serves as a natural description suitable for an AI-generated photo prompt. It is well within the 80-word limit and is presented as a single paragraph.

OK
